quote: Give me six hours to chop down a tree and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Working hard and working smart sometimes can be two different things.
author: Byron Dorgan

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
author: Karen Lamb

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Practice does not make perfect. Perfect practice makes perfect.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The more I practice, the luckier I get.
author: Gary Player

quote: Plan your work and work your plan.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: It's not about having time. It's about making time.
author: Unknown

quote: Master the fundamentals, and the rest will follow.
author: Unknown

quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Unless commitment is made, there are only promises and hopes; but no plans.
author: Peter Drucker
